content:
NetTcpBindingElement Class

Definition

Represents an XML element that specifies a binding for peer channel-specific TCP messaging.

In this Article

public class NetTcpBindingElement : System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement
Inheritance
Object
ConfigurationElement
ServiceModelConfigurationElement
StandardBindingElement
NetTcpBindingElement
Derived
NetTcpContextBindingElement

Remarks

The netTcpBinding is a secure, reliable, optimized binding suitable for cross-machine communication. By default, it generates a run-time communication stack with WS-ReliableMessaging for reliability, Windows Security for message security and authentication, TCP for message delivery, and binary message encoding.

Constructors

NetTcpBindingElement()

Initializes a new instance of the NetTcpBindingElement class.

public NetTcpBindingElement ();

NetTcpBindingElement(String)

Initializes a new instance of the NetTcpBindingElement class with the specified configuration name.

public NetTcpBindingElement (string name);
Parameters
name
String

The configuration name of the binding. This value should be unique because it is used as identification for the binding.

Properties

BindingElementType

Gets the type of this configuration element.

protected override Type BindingElementType { get; }
Value
Type

The Type of this configuration element.

HostNameComparisonMode

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching the URI.

public System.ServiceModel.HostNameComparisonMode HostNameComparisonMode { get; set; }
Value
HostNameComparisonMode

A valid stem.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode* value that specifies whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching the URI. The default value is HostNameComparisonMode, which ignores the hostname in the match.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

ListenBacklog

Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of channels that can wait to be accepted on the listener.

public int ListenBacklog { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The maximum number of channels that can wait to be accepted on the listener. The default is 10.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute IntegerValidatorAttribute

Remarks

Connections in excess of this limit are queued until space below the limit becomes available.

MaxBufferPoolSize

Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a buffer pool that stores TCP messages processed by the binding.

public long MaxBufferPoolSize { get; set; }
Value
Int64

The maximum size (in bytes) used to buffer incoming messages in memory. The default value is 65,536 bytes.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute LongValidatorAttribute

MaxBufferSize

Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer used to store messages in memory.

public int MaxBufferSize { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer used to store messages in memory. The default is 65536.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute IntegerValidatorAttribute

Remarks

If the buffer is full, excess data remains in the underlying socket until the buffer has space again.

This value cannot be less than MaxReceivedMessageSize, whose default value is also 65,536 (64 KB).

MaxConnections

Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of outbound and inbound connections the service creates and accepts respectively.

public int MaxConnections { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The maximum number of outbound and inbound connections the service creates and accepts respectively. The default is 10.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute IntegerValidatorAttribute

Remarks

Incoming and outgoing connections are counted against a separate limit specified by this property. Any connection in excess of the limit is queued until a space below the limit becomes available.

MaxReceivedMessageSize

Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of a message that can be received on a channel configured with this binding.

public long MaxReceivedMessageSize { get; set; }
Value
Int64

The maximum size, in bytes, of a message that is processed by this binding. The default value is 65,536 bytes.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute LongValidatorAttribute

PortSharingEnabled

Gets or sets a boolean value that specifies whether TCP port sharing is enabled for this connection.

public bool PortSharingEnabled { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if TCP port sharing is enabled for this connection; otherwise, false.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Properties

Gets a ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.

protected override System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection Properties { get; }
Value
ConfigurationPropertyCollection

A ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.

ReaderQuotas

Gets the constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement ReaderQuotas { get; }
Value
XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement

The XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas that specifies the complexity constraints.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Remarks

The complexity constraints include items such as a maximum element depth, a maximum length for string content within the message. The constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources.

ReliableSession

Gets a configuration element that specifies whether reliable sessions are established between channel endpoints.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingOptionalReliableSessionElement ReliableSession { get; }
Value
StandardBindingOptionalReliableSessionElement

An ReliableSessionElement that specifies whether reliable sessions are enabled.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Security

Gets the type of security to be used with this binding.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpSecurityElement Security { get; }
Value
NetTcpSecurityElement

The NetTcpSecurityElement that is used with this binding.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

TransactionFlow

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the binding supports flowing WS-Transactions.

public bool TransactionFlow { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the binding supports flowing WS-Transactions; otherwise, false. The default is false.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

TransactionProtocol

Gets or sets the transaction protocol to be used with this binding.

public System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol TransactionProtocol { get; set; }
Value
TransactionProtocol

A TransactionProtocol that specifies the transaction protocol to be used with this binding.

Attributes
TypeConverterAttribute ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

TransferMode

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether messages are buffered or streamed or a request or response.

public System.ServiceModel.TransferMode TransferMode { get; set; }
Value
TransferMode

A valid TransferMode value that specifies whether messages are buffered or streamed or a request or response.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Methods

InitializeFrom(Binding)

Initializes this binding configuration with the content of the specified binding.

protected override void InitializeFrom (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding);
Parameters
binding
Binding

A binding.

OnApplyConfiguration(Binding)

Applies the specified binding to this NetNamedPipeBindingElement instance.

protected override void OnApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding);
Parameters
binding
Binding

The binding to be applied.
